name: Enjeteering
description:
On Thursday night, a smart but reckless engineering student decides to test his prototype BPD - Beer Propulsion Device (patent pending) and use it to reach FEUP Caffé in time. He must avoid obstacles such as destructible walls and fend off the robotic enemies that have taken over the B corridor using his MWB - Mulled Wine Blaster (patent pending). However, he needs to be conservative when using this weapon in order to prevent it from overheating.

Controls

Space: use beer-propelled jetpack
Left Mouse / Q: fire weapon
Esc: pause the game

Collectibles

Beer: reduces the heat of your weapon
Coffee: restores health
1€ Coin: increases score

Powerups

Shield: protects you from a single source of damage. Can be stacked up to three charges.
Shotgun: replaces your weapon with the Mulled Wine Shotgun, a slower but more powerful gun for a short duration

Enemies

Blue Enemy: periodically fires rockets in the player's direction
Red Enemy: tracks the player, then charges and fires a horizontal laser beam for a few seconds
